about_the_game:
Become a theme restaurant tycoon and lead your Maid Café chain to success. Manage the operation of your own Maid Café and customize it to your liking! In Kurenai Maid Tycoon you will have to arrange the furniture of your own themed restaurant so that it works correctly, this applies to both the dining room and the kitchen, you will be able to decorate the dining room to make your place more attractive to certain types of customers and you will certainly have to pay attention to all the areas of your business, such as the purchase of ingredients, your advertising strategies, the expansion of your restaurant, the payment of your taxes and above all, keeping your levels of sanity stable despite all the adverse events that may happen to you .

This is a game for lovers of the Tycoon genre, it is a fresh proposal where we do not seek to be a particularly heavy and dense game, on the contrary, we want it to be a fun, challenging but not overwhelming experience. You will be able to improve your kitchen equipment through a system of "Skill Tree" for the equipment, the workers will have levels of rarity and therefore their efficiency and effectiveness will depend on it, although the happiness of all of them influences their work and your sanity.

In the store you can buy new equipment, new furniture, additional recipes, expand the storage size of your kitchen, among many other things, everything you find in the game can be unlocked with in-game money, we are not going to ask you for micro -additional transactions.

The operation of the restaurant is almost automatic, both your maids and cooks know what they have to do, but you can intervene in certain cases to support the service, however, your main responsibility is to maintain all the necessary conditions for the service to come out correctly , establish strategies so that your place is always crowded and take care of the obligations daily or otherwise, this will have consequences on your operation and therefore, also on your sanity.

The game has a tone of satire and humor that will fill your experience with laughter, but you will also have to overcome adversity. You will find these features and more, now take the reins of your own venture in the gastronomy sector and create your chain of themed restaurants in Kurenai Maid Tycoon.
detailed_description:
Become a theme restaurant tycoon and lead your Maid Café chain to success. Manage the operation of your own Maid Café and customize it to your liking! In Kurenai Maid Tycoon you will have to arrange the furniture of your own themed restaurant so that it works correctly, this applies to both the dining room and the kitchen, you will be able to decorate the dining room to make your place more attractive to certain types of customers and you will certainly have to pay attention to all the areas of your business, such as the purchase of ingredients, your advertising strategies, the expansion of your restaurant, the payment of your taxes and above all, keeping your levels of sanity stable despite all the adverse events that may happen to you .

This is a game for lovers of the Tycoon genre, it is a fresh proposal where we do not seek to be a particularly heavy and dense game, on the contrary, we want it to be a fun, challenging but not overwhelming experience. You will be able to improve your kitchen equipment through a system of "Skill Tree" for the equipment, the workers will have levels of rarity and therefore their efficiency and effectiveness will depend on it, although the happiness of all of them influences their work and your sanity.

In the store you can buy new equipment, new furniture, additional recipes, expand the storage size of your kitchen, among many other things, everything you find in the game can be unlocked with in-game money, we are not going to ask you for micro -additional transactions.

The operation of the restaurant is almost automatic, both your maids and cooks know what they have to do, but you can intervene in certain cases to support the service, however, your main responsibility is to maintain all the necessary conditions for the service to come out correctly , establish strategies so that your place is always crowded and take care of the obligations daily or otherwise, this will have consequences on your operation and therefore, also on your sanity.

The game has a tone of satire and humor that will fill your experience with laughter, but you will also have to overcome adversity. You will find these features and more, now take the reins of your own venture in the gastronomy sector and create your chain of themed restaurants in Kurenai Maid Tycoon.

name: Kurenai Maid Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Atom® x7-Z8750
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Become a theme restaurant tycoon and lead your chain of Maid Cafés to success. Manage the operation of your own Maid Café and customize it to your style! You will be able to manage suppliers, workers, decorations and much more!
supported_languages:
Spanish - Latin America*, English*
*languages with full audio support
